'''Arasaha''' is an open-world [[NPC]] from [[Sumeru]]. It is an [[Aranara]] responsible for sealing [[Ruin Machines]] throughout Sumeru using [[Stone Pillar Seal]]s. They remain in the underground of the [[Ashavan Realm]] after completing the {{Quest|Legends of the Stone Lock}}.

;(Talk to Arasaha)
:'''Arasaha:''' Nara {{Traveler}}...
